title: The 39-Minute Music Session Town Hall
summary: Trump turned a town hall Q&A into a 39-minute music listening session. Stopped taking questions and just played songs while swaying on stage. Crowd stood confused.
keyFacts: October 2024: Turned town hall Q&A into 39-minute music listening session
Stopped taking questions and just played songs while swaying on stage
Crowd stood confused as Trump listened to his playlist
Event was supposed to be about answering voters' questions
Went on for 39 minutes before event ended
Raised questions about his mental state and fitness
